game.name: U.N. Owen Was Her?
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Escape a Scarlet Mansion haunted by U.N. Owen..? Feed or fight roaming entities, solve light and gear puzzles, and use hunger to survive. Explore grand halls and a vast library, descend into a sealed underground, and defeat the original U.N. Owen.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Escape a Scarlet Mansion haunted by U.N. Owen..? Feed or fight roaming entities, solve light and gear puzzles, and use hunger to survive. Explore grand halls and a vast library, descend into a sealed underground, and defeat the original U.N. Owen.
